short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension made to help VIT students connect to their WiFi seamlessly !!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Still stuck with the frustating way of connecting to VIT WiFi everytime you work?
ViFi has got you covered !!
Just install the extension, and you're almost set.

Do I need a course to use this?
Obviously not...

Just click on the extension icon, type in your credentials, and save it.
(Hakuna Matata: Yes, it's saved locally)

Feel lazy to click on the Login/Logout button ?
Even we did, so better use shortcuts right...

To Login: Ctrl + Shift + V
To Logout: Ctrl + Shift + L
